code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import API from"../utils/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BoardsList=()=>{const[boards,setBoards]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBoards=async()=>{try{const res=await API.get("/boards");setBoards(res.data);}catch(err){console.error("Error loading boards:",err);}};fetchBoards();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex-1 flex flex-col",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-4",children:"All Boards"}),boards.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-500",children:"No boards available."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid md:grid-cols-3 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:boards.map(board=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/boards/".concat(board._id),className:"bg-white p-4 rounded-xl shadow hover:shadow-md transition border border-gray-200",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-1",children:board.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-500 text-sm",children:board.description||"No description"})]},board._id))})]})})});};export default BoardsList;
